replies.body:
Haven't spoken to you in a while
You were a minimod, and I will probably still call you one.
You get criticised a lot by different groups of people for some reason.
You're mature in your thinking and actions, though sometimes I question the ways you defend yourself sometimes.
You're also a bow god/spammer, that's another thing. Don't think I have anything else to say

Best moment? I'm really not too sure to be honest. I'm horrible at choosing the best things. I guess maybe when I had friends I would talk to on TS while playing Avicus?

replies.body:
Hi Lego
As a player you're really good skilled at bow and sword, being able to lead and get others to work as a team.
As a person you can be really nice, but you're those kind of people who can become quite toxic at times. I believe you would be the type of person I could talk to if I ever needed one. Also still grateful that you gave me the opportunity to be in Apollo.

Hey, it has been awhile.

Opinions?

How's NCC? POP already?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey, it has been awhile.

replies.body:
I just like it. Can't really explain it. I did stop playing for around a year but it wasn't too hard to get back, especially with the new games. People keep saying it's a kids game when it's really not. Kinda fascinating how a seemingly simple game on the outside is actually so complicated, with tons of mechanics combined with the RNG. It's crazy. Kinda sad I'm like the only person in my class who plays it lol.

Do holidays? I never get those questions. I do have holidays though, school and public ones.

I wasn't around during MCZone, though people say I was. Was I? So I can't answer that.

I don't listen to music, and not a big fan of them in the first place. However if I do it would be those catchy ones or those with a very obvious beat and rhythm. idk tbh

I don't know any texture packs

I don't have a favourite movie, just like how I don't have a favourite actor or song.

kelr, bow god, pinger like all those other american people. Scary person to fight. Been friends with you for a while, and you've pretty much remained the same nice and chill person.

Get off mobile then

It's crazy. Kinda sad I'm like the only person in my class who plays it lol.

Do holidays? I never get those questions. I do have holidays though, school and public ones.

I wasn't around during MCZone, though people say I was. Was I? So I can't answer that.

I don't listen to music, and not a big fan of them in the first place. However if I do it would be those catchy ones or those with a very obvious beat and rhythm. idk tbh

I don't know any texture packs

I don't have a favourite movie, just like how I don't have a favourite actor or song.

kelr, bow god, pinger like all those other american people. Scary person to fight. Been friends with you for a while, and you've pretty much remained the same nice and chill person.

Get off mobile then

replies.body:
It has been a while

You seem to not like the staff team way more than before, and can be quite toxic because of that. I do understand why though. You're generally a nice person and it's great to have someone from Singapore that I can talk to. Also I don't think you play Minecraft too much anymore, but I've heard and seen that you've improved as a player.

School is the same as always, maybe with a little more homework nowadays. I probably feel that way because of my garbage time management. MYEs coming also, can't get myself to start studying right now, which probably come back to bite me later on considering I have like 60 science chapters + Geograhy + History and all that crap to study for.

NCC has been fine. New Sec 1s are retarded and annoying. Somewhat disappointed myself in terms of my performance, personal reasons. POP will probably be in Term 3, though around 2 more training sessions before my batch steps down.
